description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called PhraseCard, which displays a phrase item with its French and English text, a context chip, and a favorite toggle button.

classes.name: PhraseCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a card UI for a phrase item with context chip and favorite toggle.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the PhraseCard, displaying phrase details and a favorite toggle.
